query:
ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN isInfluencer BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN influencerLevel ENUM('bronze', 'silver', 'gold', 'diamond') DEFAULT 'bronze',
ADD COLUMN influencerCode VARCHAR(32) UNIQUE,
ADD COLUMN totalEarnings DECIMAL(10, 2) DEFAULT 0.00,
ADD COLUMN availableBalance DECIMAL(10, 2) DEFAULT 0.00,
ADD COLUMN totalWithdrawn DECIMAL(10, 2) DEFAULT 0.00,
ADD COLUMN followerCount INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN conversionRate DECIMAL(5, 2) DEFAULT 0.00
